ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 333
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve spent thousands of plat on various trade skills, mainly Jewelry.  But not all at once.  The most I ve ever had at one time was a bit over 4000pp. All
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Nov 29, 2000 at 09:14:28AM +1300, jbuckingham@... wrote:
> Aren't you able to make plat jewellery now? :) And if you're not on a
> mature server, theres always money to be made in the Stein of Moggok
> quest :)

I've spent thousands of plat on various trade skills, mainly Jewelry. But
not all at once. The most I've ever had at one time was a bit over 4000pp.

All it took to get rid of that was 9 (nine) failures in a row attempting to
make a platinum ruby veil, which I had previously agreed to sell for 800pp.
This was at skill 199.

Woo, I made money on that deal, you bet!

I have since stopped making jewelry for strangers. I make it for friends
and guildmates, cost of materials per attempt.

Don't worry about getting a whole pile of cash before starting. When you
get enough to make a few attempts, do it.

Pasketti of Povar
